item.description:
Schedule:
3PM to 4PM - The Field
4PM to 5PM - People's Republik
5PM to 6PM - The Plough and Stars
6PM to 7PM - The Cellar (Coopers, yeah!)
7PM to 8PM - Charlie's Kitchen
8PM to late - Tommy Doyle's (Bonus Round)

Hi all, I've done this pub-crawl before with a mate, though a slightly longer version, which ended up with us finishing at The Cellar once we realised they had Coopers. Â Its good fun and hopefully we have some nice spring weather.

Games are planned and I will be handing out prizes, let's get as many involved as we can, should be a fun day out for all concerned!

group.name: The Boston Expat Aussie Meetup Group

item.name: Central to Harvard - Spring Pubcrawl
